page.title: 05GARDEN BAZAAR
page.content: Garden Bazaar On 18th May 1985 a local family had a garden bazaar in Broadoak Avenue, Enfield. The bazaar was in aid of the National Kidney Association which raises money to buy kidney machines for people with kidney problems.Two children raised Â£289.89 at the Bazaar,they had about 200 people.The Bazaar opened at 11 am.The stalls were:toys,books,5p stall,cakes,clothes and refreshments.The Bazaar was organised by two children aged 11 and 15.They have had a bazaar for past 6 years and nearly Â£1000 has been raised.They hope to organise another bazaar in 1986 and expect to raise more money for Kidney Machines.
